Pressure.description: Pressure in kPa of the tank's internal atmosphere.

Temperature.description: Temperature in Kelvin of the tank's internal atmosphere.

TotalMoles.description: Total moles of gas and liquid in the tank.

Volume.description: Internal volume of the tank in liters.

VolumeOfLiquid.description: Volume of liquids in the tank in liters.

Ratio.description: Fill ratio of tank (total moles / max capacity).

Setting.description: Target pressure threshold for tanks with pressure control. Write to set, read to check current setting.

Open.description: Whether the tank is open to external atmosphere. 1 = open, 0 = closed.

Maximum.description: Maximum volume capacity of the tank.

RatioOxygen.description: Oxygen ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioCarbonDioxide.description: Carbon dioxide ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioNitrogen.description: Nitrogen ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioPollutant.description: Pollutant ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioVolatiles.description: Volatiles ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioWater.description: Water ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioNitrousOxide.description: Nitrous oxide ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

Combustion.description: Whether combustion is occurring in the tank. 1 = combusting.

RatioLiquidOxygen.description: Liquid oxygen ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidVolatiles.description: Liquid volatiles ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioSteam.description: Steam ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidNitrogen.description: Liquid nitrogen ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioHydrogen.description: Hydrogen ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioPollutedWater.description: Polluted water ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

RatioLiquidHydrogen.description: Liquid hydrogen ratio in tank's internal atmosphere.

PressureOutput.description: Pressure at tank's output connection (if applicable).

TemperatureOutput.description: Temperature at tank's output connection (if applicable).

TotalMolesOutput.description: Total moles at tank's output connection (if applicable).

CombustionOutput.description: Whether combustion is occurring at output (if applicable).

RatioWaterOutput.description: Water ratio at tank's output connection (if applicable).

RatioNitrousOxideOutput.description: Nitrous oxide ratio at tank's output connection (if applicable).

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID hash for this device.

On.description: Device on/off state. Write 1 to turn on, 0 to turn off.

RequiredPower.description: Power draw in watts when active.

Error.description: Returns 1 if dock has an error state (no robot, obstructed, etc).

Idle.description: Returns 1 if the robotic arm is idle (not moving).

Extended.description: Returns 1 if the robotic arm is extended.

Open.description: Read/write state for cargo loading. Write 1 to open/load, 0 to close.

Setting.description: Configurable setting for the dock operation. Specific usage depends on dock mode.

Activate.description: Write 1 to trigger the dock's primary action.

PositionX.description: X-axis position of the robotic arm.

TargetSlotIndex.description: Read/write the target slot index for cargo operations.

TargetPrefabHash.description: The prefab hash of the target item/structure the dock is interacting with.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID hash for this device.

On.description: Device on/off state. Write 1 to turn on, 0 to turn off.

Power.description: Returns 1 if battery has any charge remaining.

Error.description: Returns 1 if battery has an error (e.g., input/output on same network).

Lock.description: Read/write lock state. Write 1 to lock interaction, 0 to unlock.

Maximum.description: Maximum energy storage capacity in joules.

PowerActual.description: Actual power flow in watts. Positive = charging, negative = discharging.

PowerPotential.description: Potential power that could be supplied or received.

ReferenceId.description: Unique reference ID hash for this device.

On.description: Device on/off state (power state). Write 1 to enable, 0 to disable.

RequiredPower.description: Power draw in watts when operating.

Open.description: Read/write door open state. Write 1 to open, 0 to close.

Idle.description: Returns 1 if door is idle (not currently opening/closing).

Mode.description: Door automation mode. 0=Closed (manual), 1=Auto (opens for entities), 2=Open (stays open).

Lock.description: Read/write lock state. Write 1 to lock door, 0 to unlock.

Setting.description: Door automation sensitivity or delay setting. Higher values increase trigger distance or delay.
